product_name: West of the Hills Bike Map #1
long_description: Created by cyclists for cyclists, the West of the Hills Map #1 is perfect for western Alameda and Contra Costa county cyclists looking to improve their commute or find the ultimate single track. Detailed street-level information clearly shows bike-friendly street and highway routes, bikes paths, dirt trails, destinations, potential hazards and bike shops. Lists safety tips, bicycle clubs and organizations, notes on local biking issues and contact information for government agencies. Measures 8.5 x 4.25 in. folded; opens to 37.25 x 24.5 in. East Bay Bicycle Coalition; copyright 2008.
short_description: Created by cyclists for cyclists, the West of the Hills Map #1 is perfect for western Alameda and Contra Costa county cyclists looking to improve their commute or find the ultimate single track.
